entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Eastend
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Eastend

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eastend 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

Humidity: 70 %

Dewpoint: -27.9°C
Wind: SE 41 km/h

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h except gusting to 80 near the Trans-Canada Highway this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing rain. Wind becoming west 30 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
